scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/mainnet-twab subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:polygon: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/polygon-twab subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy:polygon-stg: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/polygon-staging-v3_4_3 subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.all-polygon: yarn clean && yarn prepare:polygon && yarn gen:polygon && yarn deploy:polygon
scripts.all-polygon-stg: yarn clean && yarn prepare:polygon && yarn gen:polygon && yarn deploy:polygon-stg
scripts.all-mainnet: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet
scripts.all-mainnet-stg: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet-stg
